topic_title:
Amazon EC2 Container Service
      TaskDefinition ContainerDefinitions PortMappings

variables.description: The port number on the container that is bound to the host port.
variables.name: ContainerPort

variables.description: The host port number on the container instance that you want to reserve for                   your container. You can specify a non-reserved host port for your container port                   mapping, or you can omit the host port (or set it to 0). If you                   specify a container port but no host port, your container port is automatically                   assigned a host port in the 49153 to 65535 port                   range.
variables.name: HostPort
